availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, printer. Kentucky native. Married to Hallie E. Todd. Father of Mary H. Todd, George Todd, and Elizabeth H. Todd. Printer in Frankfort in 1860. Publisher, with Albert G. Hodges and John W. Pruett, of The Frankfort Commonwealth newspaper.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 1 p. 83.
"John M. Todd (1828-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #61964345, accessed April 20, 2018, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/61964345.
